languages.text: {n}Глаза двойника становятся шире и глубже, огромными, как два лиловых озера. Вы входите в них, и Смысл пронизывает каждую частицу вашего естества. Вы ныряете в это блаженство духа, чтобы уже никогда не вынырнуть.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза двойника становятся шире и глубже, огромными, как два лиловых озера. Вы входите в них, и Смысл пронизывает каждую частицу вашего естества. Вы ныряете в это блаженство духа, чтобы уже никогда не вынырнуть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, as large as two purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning permeates every fibre of your being. You dive into this bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, as large as two purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning permeates every fibre of your being. You dive into this bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

{n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de tu doble se vuelven cada vez más anchos y profundos, como un par de lagos gemelos de color violeta. Te adentras en ellos y el Significado invade todo tu ser. Te sumerges de cabeza en la alegría, de la que nunca regresarás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de tu doble se vuelven cada vez más anchos y profundos, como un par de lagos gemelos de color violeta. Te adentras en ellos y el Significado invade todo tu ser. Te sumerges de cabeza en la alegría, de la que nunca regresarás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーの目はさらに広く深くなって、まるで紫色の双子湖のようだ。そこに足を踏み入れると、その思考があなたという存在のあらゆる細胞に浸透し始める。至福の中へと頭から飛び込み、二度と出てくることはない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーの目はさらに広く深くなって、まるで紫色の双子湖のようだ。そこに足を踏み入れると、その思考があなたという存在のあらゆる細胞に浸透し始める。至福の中へと頭から飛び込み、二度と出てくることはない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}冒牌货的眼睛变得更加宽阔、更加深邃，仿佛一对紫色的湖泊。你踏入湖泊之中，无数含义渗透到了你身体的每根纤维之中。你一头扎入至福之境，再也没有出来过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冒牌货的眼睛变得更加宽阔、更加深邃，仿佛一对紫色的湖泊。你踏入湖泊之中，无数含义渗透到了你身体的每根纤维之中。你一头扎入至福之境，再也没有出来过。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Augen {mf|des Doppelgängers|der Doppelgängerin} werden weiter und tiefer, wie zwei violette Seen. Du trittst in sie hinein, und die Bedeutung beginnt, jede Faser deines Wesens zu durchdringen. Du tauchst mit dem Kopf voran in die Glückseligkeit ein, für alle Zeiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen {mf|des Doppelgängers|der Doppelgängerin} werden weiter und tiefer, wie zwei violette Seen. Du trittst in sie hinein, und die Bedeutung beginnt, jede Faser deines Wesens zu durchdringen. Du tauchst mit dem Kopf voran in die Glückseligkeit ein, für alle Zeiten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux du sosie s'élargissent jusqu'à former deux lacs pourpres. Au moment où vous y posez le pied, le Sens vient imprégner chaque fibre de votre être. Vous plongez la tête la première dans cette félicité, pour ne plus jamais en sortir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kopyanın gözleri giderek büyüyor ve ikiz, mor birer göl gibi derinleşiyorlar. Onlara doğru adım atıyorsun ve varlığının her zerresine Anlam nüfuz etmeye başlıyor. Bir daha çıkmamak üzere mutluluğa balıklama dalıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger's eyes grow wider and deeper, like twin purple lakes. You step into them, and the Meaning begins to permeate every fibre of your being. You dive head-first into the bliss, never to come out again.{/n}
